Update: January 12, 2026 # We just repotted it today! The roots were looking a bit crowded, so we moved it to a 12-inch terracotta pot.
Freshly repotted! Update: February 20, 2026 # A new leaf is finally unfurling. It has great fenestrations.
The new growth is so bright green.
summary: My favorite tropical plant, currently living in the living room.
title: Monstera Deliciosa
